verses.text: \w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w times|strong="H7227"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6887"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3478"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w* \w up|strong="H6887"\w*. \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w times|strong="H7227"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6887"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H1571"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w* \w up|strong="H6887"\w*, \w yet|strong="H1571"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H3201"\w* \w against|strong="H1571"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* ploughers ploughed \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H1354"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* made \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w furrows|strong="H4618"\w* \w long|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H7112"\w* apart \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H8130"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* disappointed \w and|strong="H6726"\w* \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* backward, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w housetops|strong="H1406"\w*, \w which|strong="H2682"\w* \w withers|strong="H3001"\w* \w before|strong="H6927"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w grows|strong="H8025"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*,

\w with|strong="H4390"\w* which \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w reaper|strong="H7114"\w* doesn’t \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w his|strong="H4390"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* binds \w sheaves|strong="H6014"\w*, \w his|strong="H4390"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2683"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* say, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w*. \w We|strong="H8034"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.”
